title: Fitness-Application
description: The React Fitness Application, built with the MERN stack, helps users manage their fitness journey.

title: Notes-Maker
description: Note-Maker is a web application that could help users effectivly create,manage and organize their notes.The goal was to develop a user-friendly application using the MERN stack.

title: Simons-Game
description: Simon Game using JavaScript, leveraging APIs for sound and color generation. The game incorporates a database to store user scores and progress, enhancing its replay value and providing users with a personalized experience.
